scenes.text:
Welcome to OrphicSmp 3.0

 Use landmarks to teleport around the map, new marks will introduced in the future, you may be able to travel to other dimensions aswell.

Welcome to OrphicSmp 3.0

 - Respect other players, keep chat chill, and civil, avoid spam or advertising and any form of racism, sexism, homphobia, or any form of hate speech is banned.
 - Don't steal from others or invade, greif, or terraform their areas without permission.
 - Any type of client modification that may give you an unfair advantage is disallowed, this inclusive X-ray, and mini-maps.
